headerDisplay: Plugin for Rademacher Homepilot / HOMEPILOT Gateway
footerDisplay: For a detailed description, see the [github project](https://github.com/bombadiltom/homebridge-rademacher-homepilot)

url.title: URL
url.description: address of HomePilot's web interface in your local network, example: http://192.168.2.1

password.title: Password
password.description: password to HomePilot (if enabled in its web interface)

password_hashed.title: Password hashed
password_hashed.description: password to HomePilot is already hashed with sha256 (if enabled in its web interface), for hashing https://www.sha-generator.de/ worked for me

scenes_as_switch.title: Scenes as switch
scenes_as_switch.description: if true, all scenes are added as switch to HomeKit, otherwise scenes are not added at all

add_blinds.title: Add blinds
add_blinds.description: if true, blinds are added to HomeKit, otherwise blinds are not added at all

add_dimmer.title: Add dimmer
add_dimmer.description: if true, dimmers are added to HomeKit, otherwise dimmers are not added at all

add_thermostat.title: Add thermostat
add_thermostat.description: if true, thermostats are added to HomeKit, otherwise thermostats are not added at all

add_lock_switch.title: Add lock/switch
add_lock_switch.description: if true, locks/switches are added to HomeKit, otherwise locks/switches are not added at all

add_enviroment_sensor.title: Add enviroment sensor
add_enviroment_sensor.description: if true, enviroment sensors are added to HomeKit, otherwise enviroment sensors are not added at all

add_sun_sensor.title: Add sun sensor
add_sun_sensor.description: if true, sun sensors are added to HomeKit, otherwise sun sensors are not added at all

add_temperature_sensor.title: Add temperature sensor
add_temperature_sensor.description: if true, temperature sensors are added to HomeKit, otherwise temperature sensors are not added at all

add_door_window_sensor.title: Add door/window sensor
add_door_window_sensor.description: if true, door/window sensors are added to HomeKit, otherwise door/window sensors are not added at all

add_smoke_alarm.title: Add smoke alarm
add_smoke_alarm.description: if true, smoke alarms are added to HomeKit, otherwise smoke alarms are not added at all

did_list_usage.title: DID list usage
did_list_usage.description: if include you can choose what Devices are mirrored to HomeKit, you have to enter matching DIDs below, if exclude you can exclude a list of DIDs, default is none

did_list.title: DID list
did_list.description: enter the Device IDs (DIDs) you want to be shown in HomeKit. You can find them in the log file in square brackets ([12/6/2020, 5:40:36 PM] [RademacherHomePilot] blinds are online: bodentief [10000] => did = 10000), example list: did_list: [10000,10001,10002]
